title: Laggy client with fast laptop
body: For some reason, my client is extremely slow but in-game I get 150-200 fps. I am not really a computer person and I don't know how to fix this. There is probably a way to fix this but I don't know how. Please help! I have a dell inspiron 7559 signature edition with i7 6700 core and 8 gb of ram. I also have nvidia geforce gtx 960m.

replies.body: Since you run pretty well in-game, we can rule out a connection issue. It seems like your pc could be having a hard time rendering a specific asset in the client. Try running the client in [**low-spec**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788-League-Client-Update-FAQ#h3q6) mode to see if that helps at all.
Thank you! it helped but is there a way I can get the higher-spec loading screen without lagging?
The only way to get the high-spec loading screen would be to turn off low-spec mode. Since you're back in the game with low-spec, it's probably best to stick with that for now.
